com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules

Class AbstractRuleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.AbstractRuleFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangeCaseFactory, InsertCounterAtPositionFactory, InsertCounterBeforeAfterFactory, InsertCounterOnCollisionFactory, InsertTextAtPositionFactory, InsertTextBeforeAfterFactory, MoveTextBeforeAfterFactory, ReplaceFactory

    public abstract class AbstractRuleFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    Derived classes must call setValid(boolean) whenever their content change, in order to notify if the configuration is valid or not.

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractRuleFactory(RuleType type)
      Create a factory class for the specified rule's type

      • getParameters

        public java.lang.String[][] getParameters()
        Returns an array of array of parameters
        Returns:
        an array of array of parameters (the first array has only one element that indicates whether the rule is enabled or not, the second array contains rule's specific parameters)

      • parseParameters

        public void parseParameters(java.lang.String[][] parameters)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parses the array of array of parameter and configure the factory object
        Parameters:
        parameters - array of array of parameters (the first array must have only one element that indicates whether the rule is enabled or not, the second array must contain rule's specific parameters)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are invalid
